attributes.action: Change the planning policy for Deanshanger village, for no more loss of green field land for building.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Deanshanger in South Northamptonshire has grown considerably over the last few years.  This needs to stop.  The tranquility and history of the village is being threatend by overdevelopment.  There are several more planning applications being put forward which will bring further strain to the existing resources.  In addition, getting into and out of the village is becomming increasingly more difficult with traffic queuing very early in the morning.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local government. Please contact your local MP.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
